transcript.text: Hola que tal!
Excellent
Who am I imitate?
Dr Nozman of course!
We recognized him!
Friends, today we're on choixdemerde.fr (shittychoice.fr)
A french site, we're happy
because the France is a beautiful country, where baguettes are good
Here, it was my rejoinder
We already made some similar things, it's just a site and everytime we'll have the choice between 2 tricks
nanana or nanana
And we'll have to choose the answer that corresponds to us
And will know afterwards the percentage of people who choose the answer...
..that you have chosen before.
To see if you think like others, if you're not original, or if you're different from others
Ok let's begin
"You can be invisible, but to stay invisible, you should make noise"
It definitely sucks
Or "Travel through time, but you should stay on a tricycle" ?
It's...
Honestly, Travel through time! : you pimp your tricycle, you put a electric motor"
Y'know, you watch Nozman's videos, you'll learn how to do, Bam bam, all good!
"Excellent" Is it obvious that I watch Nozman's videos or not? *laughs*

Easy, I choose the tricycle, of course !
SEE ! 69% of people took the tricycle like me !
And... On this model you have a little basket so you can pack away your helmet !
Yes, to drive a tricycle you need an helmet.
Next question !

"Tribal tattoo or a Chinese style Tattoo ?"
*laughs*
All the guys with a tribal tattoo are upset as f*ck right now!
Clearly, Chinese Style tattoo more that the Tribal one!
Oh! WHAT?! Dude, for me the Tribal tattoo is like... um, no I won't say a thing.
You've got a tribal tattoo? Right cool, beautiful tattoo !
Tastes and colors but I find Tribal tattoo so... yuck, you know...
There's so much better in abstract art, such beautiful things! Anyways, that's my opinion !

It's my own opinion, I respect yours, even if yours sucks,
I respect it.
"Nose hair" or "Ear hair" ?
Stop joking please....

Dude, in both cases, that is dis-gusting.
"Nose hair" or "Ear hair"?
That is a existential question, we have here....
Na, clearly ear hair, ear hair!
OOH !
People prefer to have big disgusting nose hair?!
F*ck! What an asshole!
"Kill somebody" or "Being unknown from others"?
Having a shitty life, to sum it.
Well, kill someone of course not, we'll avoid that, I'll choose being unknown from others.
Crap, 789 people are ready to kill someone not to be unknown from others!
Crazy!
"Relieve yourself in a litter" or "Relieve yourself in front of someone else" ?
For exemple, in front of Poutine.
Erm... Relieve yourself in front of someone is the most embarassing thing ever.
You're alone, you don't give a fuck, pooping in a pot or in your toilet, or even in a litter.

So, I choose a litter.
What 39% would do that in front of someone else?!

Intimacy, dude, where it is? 
Unbelievable.

"Cyril Hanouna (french presenter)"
or "a lamprey"?
Dude...

Don't touch my lamprey, dude.
("Touche pas à ma lamproie"
word play with Touche pas à mon poste 
from Cyril Hanouna)

"Bread crumb in the bed" or 
"a pants label that is really itchy"
AAAAAAAAH!!
I HATE IT when that fucking label cause me itch!
Some brand made a label that you can take off.
You can pull it off with that dotted line.
Then, when you took it off, it's even more itchy because of that dotted line, it's not soft anymore.

Honestly, the bread crumb in the bed.
At 3AM you suddenly realize that you have to take your hoover and clean the mess.
*vacuum cleaner sound*

Goodbye crumb!
It's true!
Oh, 53% of the people prefer having an itchy ass, that's crazy!

"Look like Ribery" or "Look like the Bogdanov Brothers"
I was thinking : what's worst than Ribery?
Yeah but the Bogdanov Brothers I think they did plastic surgery, it's obvious, even if they say the don't.
But for Ribery.....it's all natural
Well, i don't know cause Ribery has pretty eyes...Look.
His mother stole all the stars from the sky and put them in his eyes to have such pretty eyes.
I love doing that one, I do that in all my videos
Honestly, look like Bogdanov Brothers!
Oh! 54% of people prefer to look like Ribery
You know that you'll just look like Ribery, you'll do the same job you do right now
You won't be football player like him and be billionaire, no, no... you'll just have the same face as him.
"Drink the toilet water" or "Breath the exhaust system

Clearly, breath the air of a exhaust system 
(behind of the car)
*stomach noise*
My stomach agrees
What?!
Dude, I clearly don't understand ?! Drinking toilet water?!
Toilet.....water! Not when you perfectly clean up your toilets! No...No...no, the water, the real one, dude!
The exhaust system you just do *breathe* and, done! Over! It lasts 1 sec!

I...no I don't know...I feel betrayed by my own country...
I think I'm gonna live in Brittany. (which is still in France)
*screams*

"Squeezie" (himself) or "Cyprien" 
(a friend of him and French favorite youtuber)
Norman! (another friend of him and friend of Cyprien, also very known in France)
Ok, Cyprien....See... like 58% other people said...

I....This quizz is not that good actually...
(He jokes about the fact people prefer Cyprien)
"Constipation" or "Diarrhea"?
Big dilemma!
I..I think I've never had constipation in my life, so I don't known what it does, so I would say Constipation, cause you put a....
ALL RIGHT! You put a disgusting suppository and you're done with it!
But diarrhea dude, you might eat rice, you still have it! And then you eat rice again, and it's still not over!
And 57% of course think that constipation is better!
I'm feeling good when people think like me. It's a social phenomenon that everybody knows, you need to feel that people think like you do
Even if most of the people are dumb, you still think like them, you tell yourself : "those people aren't dumb", and you feel good!
"Live without music" or "Live without your phone" ?
No phone! Clearly!
Dude, I honestly don't give a fuck about my phone, but Music, dude it's life!
To tell you, my secret before doing a video, to be in good mood, because i'm not always in good mood,
My secret is to listen to music that I truly love and It gives me joy, it makes me feel so great !
I tell you ! For exemple, just before I was listening to a music *music*
I was like : Yeah ! I'm Happy ! I've got the best job in the world! Let's go, let's shoot!
So embarassing...
Pfff *laughs*
Zabilla (mix of both)
Dunno...
Honestly I would say Nabilla
I don't even know why, + people didn't choose like me...
"Being immortal on earth" or "Living 20 years on a extraterrestrial pacifist planet"?
I like the "pacifist" detail, just to guide you a little bit on your choice.
So you won't argue like : "Yeah but if you go on the extraterrestrial planet to be a slave and die because the guys kill me for free um..."  (brat)
Well no ! Cause they're pacifist, so you shut up!
I always thought that being immortable would be terruble cause if you're the only one to be immortal, then you see all your close one dying one by one...
You'll never live again...Even if physically you're immortal, psychologically you'll be devasted...
So, it's better to live 20 year on a pacifist planet !
Once again I don't understand. Why people want to be immortal...it's so odd dude...
Your mother, your dad, your love, your siblings will die...
They won't be immortal, they're gonna die, you'll see them dying
What you're gonna do next? You'll be like : "Yes, Yes but me i'm... " I don't know
It's really beautiful what i'm saying but because it's me it really sucks

"Make C'est pas sorcier's Mock up" 
(scientific show)
Dude, dream job!
I know what you're thinking right now : why your counselor didn't tell you : Why won't you create, um...
Mock ups for C'est pas Sorcier, Lucas? When you'll be older?
or "Having Fred and Jamy" name instead of your name

Dude! I  want to make mock ups ! Without a doubt ! 
It would be an honnor the Jamy uses my mock ups !

"Black" or "White" 
(Hee hee)
Ok they put Black on the white and White on the Black...
White, i like it and ....people prefer black...Ok.
"Lose 500£/$/€" or "Stealing to a homeless person"
Dude, losing 500€, stop the bullsh*ts right now
30% are total bastards then? Right, ok
Those guy totally don't give a fuck!
You're little assholes...
White rasta or Punk with dogs?
Slapping both
A White rasta, in fact I like that, it makes me laugh, it's funny to be honest.
The guy was born in the wrong country, he truly wanted to be born in Jamaica, he's so pissed off!

So he does his best to be like Jamaican people...
but he's white
He's 80% less stylish than the real one
An ingrown nail
Or your uncle in prison?
*laughs*
The nail, you heal it and it's over, you don't want to see your uncle in prison
Ok right ! 67% are real bastards, they stole from an homeless then they go and see their uncle in prison.
You selfish, a ingrown nail you heal it and it's done ! 2 weeks and you're over it !

Your uncle in prison, 
well he's in prison, that's not nice for him

"Not having toilet paper left"
or "Not having toothpast left"
Dude, not having toothpast left
Ok
*sudden silence*
I fucked up my life or...

Not having paper left, you can't wipe yourself, 
you're screwed

You need to wait until next day to ....
yeah end of argument
Well my friend it's already the end of the video on shittychoices.fr
Like the video if you liked it and go answer the questio,s to know if people think like you do
You'll maybe feel very bad if you don't choose like others, but it makes you a unique and original human being
See you in the next video, thanks for watching !
*horn*
